Title: Permits animal-drawn vehicles to equip and use amber flashing lights
Summary: Permits animal-drawn vehicles to equip and use amber flashing lights; does not apply to such vehicles in a city with a population of one million or more.
LawCode: Amd ยง376, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to permitting animal-drawn vehicles to equip and use amber flashing lights
